name: Basic Lease
body:
Basic Lease Agreement
You are granted non-exclusive rights to use the beat in one (1) music video and up to 50,000 streams.

name: Premium Lease
body:
Premium Lease Agreement
Includes MP3 + WAV. Up to 250,000 streams and two (2) music videos.

name: Unlimited Lease
body:
Unlimited Lease Agreement
Unlimited streams, unlimited videos, includes stems.

name: Exclusive Rights
body:
Exclusive Rights Agreement
Full ownership transfer after purchase. Beat removed from store.
